channel.title: 667 Webclient help needed
channel.description: So i uploaded my webclients .jar to my webclient.html and run it, and it tells me the plugin is not supported... now i believe it has to do with this new dropbox thing, when i further look into it, it's telling my my dropbox link is the error area. any ideas?

item.title: 667 Webclient help needed
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Chrome is dropping support for NPAPI which Java uses for their plugin. You will need to switch to Firefox to continue to use java.

Read full topic

item.title: 667 Webclient help needed
item.dc:creator: @Blitzx Blitzx
item.description:
@Blitzx wrote:

So i uploaded my webclients .jar to my webclient.html and run it, and it tells me the plugin is not supported…
now i believe it has to do with this new dropbox thing, when i further look into it, it’s telling my my dropbox link is the error area.
any ideas?
